title: Security
body: Don't just Google, maybe you can link social media like Twitter, Telegram, Discord for the future.
author: adammaulee

comments.body: I don't think I understand this request. Can you elaborate more to we have a clearer understanding of what you're asking?

title: Allow EAP Signup from any solana wallet provider
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Currently, the EAP transfer function checks for Phatom wallet. We allow privy signups other wallets such as Solflare, but the payment cannot be sent with it

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Allow sending of EAP from any solana wallet
author: slimeonmyhead

comments.body: This will be available once we turn on subscriptions. Removes the need for any wallet provider as we'll use the embedded wallet.

title: New features
body:
* New project safety scanner. 
Bundle / sniper / bubblemap analyzer. Could give a rating based on how safe it is

* X scraper - searches the sentiment regarding a given cash tag and the frequency in which it's being used to gauge whether it is starting to pick up momentum
author: Dirtwood

title: DEX Chart Integration
body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
We would like an agent tool to be capable of adding a chart to the output.

Feel free to use any API to get the price history as long as it is friendly to small developers who might wish to run this locally
author: slimeonmyhead

title: Telegram Notification Integration
body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
We would like a way for users to link an action with telegram notifications. Once automated actions are released, users will probably want ways to be notified on the status of their automation.

Configure a way for users to be notified, this can be added to the toolset of the agent.
author: slimeonmyhead

comments.body:
Are we supposed to write the steps for you 
Or we are supposed to get it done

title: using a DEXSCREENER api
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

why is NEUR using a DEXSCREENER api instead of querying the on chain directly?

If you want to interact with DeFi protocols, using a DexScreener API aint the way.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

I took this request from someones X tweet, seems like good to fix that
author: tommycrpt

comments.body:
Why is Solana’s Official Agent Kit using PumpPortal API to launch tokens instead of interacting directly with PumpFun’s Solana program on-chain? Why is it using Jupiter’s API to swap tokens instead of finding pools to swap on-chain?

And why are you creating this GitHub issue with your browser instead of sending a POST request via your terminal?

At this point in time, it is better to iterate faster and get feedback on features before deciding where to optimize. These APIs are pretty generous in usage limits. They provide the data in easily consumable format that allows more features to be pushed out.

If this project relied on RPC calls for everything, it would hit free tier limits quickly and be prohibitive for some developers to test it out. This project is already pretty expensive for the AI calls, it's best right now to keep the barrier to entry low for new devs.

Even Eliza's solana plugin relies on Birdeye Premium API that costs $60/month.

title: Code Style Guide or Prettier Config
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
The current codebase is a little inconsistent (usage of semicolons for example). I had to disable all formatting when editing to avoid tons of changes

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Add a prettier config or some code style/formatter guide to allow for consistent changes to be done by outside contributors

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Disabling formatters which results in inconsistent code style
author: slimeonmyhead

comments.body: Hello. It should be settled now.
